title: Need help on Windows update
body: Every time I do updates and they fail. It keeps saying retry and it keeps failing. I called Microsoft support and they completely stuffed up my computer. I had to buy Windows 10 on a USB as my computer was stuck in a infinite loop. I have fixed my computer now. Fresh install of Windows 10 and League of legends. Does anyone know how to fix the windows update failing to to updates? I do not want to go to Microsoft again. Thanks
